data.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV - Magical Girl Bundle
data.detailed_description:
A set of costumes that turn your party into the cast of Magical Girl Alisa R.

Magical Alisa x 1
Princess Knight Laura x 1
Butterfly Witch Emma x 1
Kitty Ninja Fie x 1
Kitty Ninja Accessories x 1
Elite Ninja Sara x 1
Magical Juna x 1
Magical Darkness x 1
Magical Tiara x 1
Magical Musse x 1
Magical Twin Tails x 1
School Girl Duvalie x 1

*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page. After obtaining the items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.
